players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today."
You: "That's a lie, Bob. I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. You're trying to frame me to save yourself."
Charlie: "I think we need to be very careful before voting. Bob and Alice are accusing each other, but we only have one mafioso. We should look for inconsistencies before deciding who to vote out."
You: "Bob is clearly lying. If he were the detective, why would he investigate me first instead of someone more suspicious? He's trying to get me voted out to win the game for the mafia."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Alice is lying about investigating Diana - Diana was dead when night began. Vote Alice out."

Charlie: "I don't think we have enough proof to vote Alice out yet. Bob's investigation could be true, but Alice makes a good point about Diana already being dead. We need to be sure before we lose someone innocent."
